alert.note: Alert for Curry County Coast; South Central Oregon Coast (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 27 at 2:19AM PST until December 27 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THIS MORNING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM PST TUESDAY ABOVE 500 FEET... * WHAT...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 2 inches. For the second Winter Weather Advisory above 500 feet, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 2 inches. * WHERE...South Central Oregon Coast and Curry County Coast, South Central Oregon Coast and Curry County Coast, including Brookings, Gold Beach, Port Orford, Bandon, Coos Bay, North Bend, Reedsport, Coquille, and Myrtle Point. Impacts are expected for all area roads and highways. * WHEN...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, until 10 AM PST this morning. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, from 10 PM this evening to 10 AM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: * Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. * Carry tire chains and be prepared for snow covered roads and limited visibilities. * See https://www.tripcheck.com for latest road conditions. * A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means that periods of snow will cause travel difficulties.

area.areaDesc: Curry County Coast; South Central Oregon Coast
